snippet: An elaborately appointed triplex penthouse with a 3,000-square-foot rooftop terrace on Park Avenue is poised to enter the market.
abstract: Triplex penthouse at 655 Park Avenue, crowned by a rambling 3,000-square-foot rooftop terrace that offers multiple cityscape views from its 11th-floor perch, is poised to enter the market at $11.5 million.
lead_paragraph: An elaborately appointed triplex penthouse with a 3,000-square-foot rooftop terrace on Park Avenue is poised to enter the market.

headline.seo: A Park Avenue Penthouse for $11.5 Million
